Chat bot

01 May 2018 - navasai

RESUME/CV BUILDER CHAT BOT

Resume or CV Builder Chat Bot is a conversational agent that can automate the process of designing CVs for the applicants. Created many bots using Dialog Flow, Azure Bot Composer and Azure Bot SDK. Chat Bot will read the user messages which are called utterances. And find the user intention called intent. Based on the user intention, bot will take action on entities.
